txt.en: 'I ask your permission to advise here, my lady.'
'You may speak freely, Dunward. How else can I hope to make amends for my earlier words?'
'This prisoner is nothing to us in a jail cell.'
'Guards, free this man at once, and bring him to the gate.''
'If he can stop the attack, we should let him try.'
'I agree. Prisoner, you are free to go -- on the condition that you keep your word.'
'Oathbreakers are not favoured in life. Your punishment would be beyond anything we could inflict.'
'On my honour, I'll see that the attack is stopped.'
'My boys will leave this forest, I swear it on my life!'
